alert.note: Alert for Cross; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 2:11PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Poinsett and western Cross Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 211 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fair Oaks, or 11 miles northwest of Wynne, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wynne, Hickory Ridge, Vanndale, Brushy Lake, Hydrick, Fair Field, Supply, Hamlin and Tilton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
